item.title: Skiddaw Summit via Jenkins Bridleway
item.description:
Hiking to Skiddaw Summit & Little Man

Overview

Parking isnt great and you need to arrive early to have any chance of a parking space (the car park is small). Otherwise this was a fantastic hike with great views. We even managed to experience a cloud inversion.

After some early clag this cleared and its a pretty steep and brutal ascent. We took in Skiddaw little man also and recommend you tackle this afer summitting.

Key Hike Points

  • Steep but rewarding ascent
  • Cloud inversion at the summit
  • Claggy start
  • Limited parking — arrive early

item.title: Creating a Reusable Hike Info Box in Jekyll
item.description:
Introduction

In this post, I’ll explain how I created a reusable Hike Info Box for my hiking posts using Jekyll and the Jekflix theme. The system is modular and can be adapted to any category, whether hiking, tech tutorials, recipes, or music albums.

The main goals:

  1. Store metadata in the front-matter.
  2. Render a visually appealing info box with icons, animations, and badges.
  3. Only display the box for relevant posts.
  4. Make it easy to reuse for future posts.
